text: Building a full text search engine: where to start
I want to write a web application using Google App Engine (so the reference language would be Python).
My application needs a simple search engine, so the users would be able to find data specifying keywords.
For example, if I have one table with those rows:
and the user queries for "space", rows 1 and 2 would be returned.
If the user queries for "office space", the result should be rows 1 and 2 too (row 1 first).
What are the technical guidelines/algorithms to do this in a simple way?
Can you give me good pointers to the theory behind this?
Edit: I'm not looking for anything complex here (say, indexing tons of data).
